page.title: 02People in Well and District
page.content: There are 304 adults and 83 children , 16 under 5.In the outlying farms and cottages are25 adults and 11 children. Nosterfield has 17 retired out of 87 adults-20% and Well has 48 out of 192 -25%,27 are long term residents and 21 have come in the last 5 years.2 had the chance of a council bungalow, another an almshouse and 3 came to be near younger relatives.Surprisingly there are as many retired men as women and as many over 80 men as women. Many families are old established, their names recurring in early church records and on old maps; other families, obviously influential at one time, are not represented. There is a most satisfactory socio- economic mix. No-one is poor and there are trusts for help in times of need. No-one is obviously rich - wealth is probably invested in land.
